p: In part II, two additional nylon meshes with mesh sizes of 25 and 100 μm were added in the filtration device according to Talvitie et al. ( 2015). In addition, one set of replicates was dried in oven at 45 °C overnight (15 hours) and other replicates at room temperature (45 hours) in order to assess the differences between different drying procedures. Lid of the petri dishes were kept slightly open in both cases.
